articles.author: Didi Tang, Sam McNeil
articles.title: Pushed by Trump, US allies are resetting relations with China - AP News
articles.description: Leaders from Canada, the United Kingdom, Finland and other countries have recently visited China, while more are planning to go. In a major shift to the world order since President Donald Trump took office again, America’s closest allies are exploring opportu…
articles.content:
BRUSSELS (AP) Chinese President Xi Jinping has had a busy few weeks receiving Western allies seeking warmer ties with the worlds second-largest economy.
Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney struck a … [+6933 chars]
